DOC.brief_summary: Non-randomized , comparative study ( 1:1 allocation ) study interaction nevirapine-containing antiretroviral therapy combine oral contraceptive pill .
DOC.brief_title: Interactions Between Antiretrovirals ( ARVs ) Combined Oral Contraceptives ( COCs )
DOC.criteria: Willing provide inform consent Willing take COCs follow study requirement Has regular menstrual cycle every 2135 day ( take hormonal contraception ) Last menstrual period ( LMP ) < 35 day study entry Has body mass index 1830 Negative urine pregnancy test enrollment Documented HIV1 infection On nevirapinecontaining ART least three month ( ART group ) CD4 cell count great equal 350 ( nonARV group ) Currently sexually active plan stay sexually active next 6 month Medical contraindication COC use Recent pregnancy ( within 3 month ) Has breastfed last 3 month Last pregnancy ectpoic Has sterilize Has follow condition since last pregnancy , since menarche never pregnant : Pelvic Inflammatory disease Diagnosis infertility Has DMPA within 6 month NET injectable within 3 month study entry ( menses since last injection regardless time ) take hormonal therapy besides COCs ( e.g. , combine injectables , progestin implant intrauterine system , progestinonly contraceptive pill , medroxyprogesterone acetate , hormone replacement therapy ) within 30 day study entry Has acute infection opportunistic disease require therapy within 14 day enrollment Has active drug alcohol use , opinion investigator , would interfere adherence study requirement Has take prohibit medication within 30 day study entry Has chronic diarrhea , malabsorption inability maintain adequate oral intake Has condition ( social medical ) opinion investigator would make study participation unsafe complicate data interpretation
